message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient's symptoms and physical examination are consistent with bulimia nervosa. Fluoxetine is an FDA-approved medication for the treatment of bulimia nervosa. Orlistat is a weight loss medication but is not appropriate for this patient's condition. Mirtazapine and Venlafaxine are antidepressants but do not have FDA approval for the treatment of bulimia nervosa.
